metadata.name: 1 Triclosan Anti microbial Foaming Skin Cleanser 0 003 mg 1mL Soap

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Triclosan is used in a variety of common household products including soaps mouthwashes dish detergents toothpastes deodorants and hand sanitizers It is also used in health care settings in surgical scrubs and personnel hand washes

contraindications.disease: Oral LD50 Rat 3700 mg kg Dermal LD50 Rabbit 9300 mg kg
